features: MADE IN USA: Proudly manufactured in a state of the art facility in Ontario, California. MagiCare masks are manufactured under strict quality control standards in a cleanroom facility.
BREATHABLE & COMFORTABLE: Our disposable masks for adults are made from extra soft, non-woven materials of the highest quality.
3 LAYER PROTECTION: Feature three effective filter layers with a high filtration melt-blown middle layer for maximum protection. The inner layer is designed for comfort while keeping things cool!
SOFT EARLOOPS: The ear loops are latex-free, highly stretchable elastic and made to last. These black disposable masks are designed to fit adults, small or large faces.
STRONG/ BENDABLE NOSE BRIDGE: The nose piece is a strong, adjustable nose wire. Holds shape longer and contours to the shape of your face for the perfect fit.
Instructions for Use: For single use only. Properly dispose after each use. To avoid irritations to the skin, wear for a maximum of 4 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Disposable masks for adults proudly made in the USA! MAGICARE IS A QUALITY STANDARD The shortage of personal protective equipment inspired a team of entrepreneurs to rise to the challenge. By investing in highly automated machines, quality raw materials, and a state-of-the-art clean room facility, MagiCare was able to manufacture high-quality masks in the United States.

Made from high quality materials. Allows air and moisture to pass through for maximum breathability. Highly stretchable elastic ear loops that are made to last. Extra soft inner layer made from non-woven materials.

Strong, adjustable nose wire. Contours to the shape of your face for the perfect fit. Super soft latex-free ear loops for all-day, comfortable wear. 3 effective layers with a high filtration melt-blown middle layer for maximum protection.
Our American-made masks are worn in a variety of settings.
Blue Black Made in the USA ✓ ✓ ASTM Level 1 ✓ 3 Layer Protection ✓ ✓ Pack of 50 ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easily stayed on your ears, comfort over face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best mask is the mask you wear
reviews.reviewText: I tried hard to tolerate N95 masks. But the top edge digs into my eyes. And breathing is a challenge. This mask may not be the most protective on the market, but it’s protective enough, and it’s kind to my face. This is a mask I will wear without suffering.It’s basically a surgical mask, but in fashionable black, rather than operating-room blue. I’m fashion conscious, so I like a black mask. And I like the fact that it’s made in the USA. I don’t trust masks made in countries that use noxious chemicals in their manufacturing processes. This mask has no smell, a good sign.The mask fans out to fit my face, and there’s a nose pincher to further improve the fit. It’s very lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The fit could be a little more tighter on the ear loops

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy wearable mask
reviews.reviewText: The price, style and comfort is what i like about the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this during the pandemic, it was super easy to breathe through it, I chose this color because it looks nice. 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Recent Drop in Quality
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been a Subscribe and Save customer for over a year. I would have given this 5 stars up to my more recent order (I believe in Dec. 2022). I am reviewing the black 50 ct masks.They used to fit so well and were thick but not suffocatingly so. I could wear them all day while teaching and had no issues. I loved that they were made in America and had no odor.The most recent box *looked* the same but the quality has significantly decreased enough to leave this review.The masks that I received were so thin (I could feel the difference) and do not fit well on my face. I feel the elastic is thin and almost seems stretched out and it feels like I have a thin tissue paper over my nose and mouth.Tried calling the phone number on the website but only got a voice mail. If this is the new quality going forward I will have to stop my subscription and shop elsewhere. I will change my 3 stars (probably should be 2) if the next shipment is back to normal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Las mascarillas son perfectas..Gruesas y cómodas..Ahora la usamos para el COVID y flu o una simple gripe..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What I asked for.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a basic, no frills, inexpensive and disposable mask. Also, one that could accommodate my big-ass head. This one filled the bill.Big enough to accommodate my large cerebrum with comfortable ear loops (they don't make me look like a scared cat pulling its ears forward to detect a possible threat), and I can talk and chew gum at the same time without the mask pulling down to my chin. Therefore, I give it high marks for "oration facilitation".Sure, it's not of the higher standards of a N95 or KN95 mask, but it's just a step beneath that and functional enough to fill my personal requirements. If I need an N95, I'll get one. Otherwise, this one is perfectly fine for my needs and reasonably priced.
